actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to create a federal criminal offense for operating or directing the operation of a common carrier while intoxicated or under the influence of drugs.

summary.text: Amends the Federal criminal code to make it a Federal offense for any person to operate or direct the operation of a common carrier while under the influence of alcohol or drugs and as a result cause: (1) damage to the property of another; or (2) injury to any other person. Imposes a fine of not more than $10,000 and/or imprisonment for not more than five years for violations of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to create a federal criminal offense for operating or directing the operation of a common carrier while intoxicated or under the influence of drugs.
